title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Design for Enhancing Mobile Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Mobile Device Utilization and Basic Knowledge in the Sciences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can complete project assignments with over 90% success by applying self-regulated learning strategies in mobile environments.
Learners can explain three or more mobile learning adaptation strategies to overcome resistance to change.
Learners can create learning plans leveraging the flexibility (overcoming time/space constraints) and engaging elements (e.g., gamification) of mobile learning.
Learners can achieve an average score of 4.0/5.0 or higher on all items of the mobile learning satisfaction survey
Over 80% of learners can indicate their intention to continue using mobile learning within three months after completing the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
